machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;----------Proforge Original Dual Start G-code---------- 
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;Set Bed Temp 
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} T0; Heat up Hotend 1 (T0) 
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} T1; Heat up Hotend 2 (T1)
 M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} T0; Wait for Hotend 1 (T0)  
 M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} T1 ;Wait for Hotend 2 (T1) 
G28 ;Home 
G29 ;Autolevel Bed 
M420 Z5 ;Levelling fade off 
G1 F8000 X10 Y5 ;Move hotend to bottom left corner 

; ---Unique to your setup---
G0 Z0.0 ;Set Z-offset in 0.1mm incriments (Increase if first layer too low)
; --------------------------

G92 Z{layer_height_0} ;Set to first layer height 
M82 ;absolute extrusion mode 
G92 E0 ;Zero Extruder 
G1 F1500 X145 E15 ;Prime Hotend
; ----------Proforge Original Dual Start G-code----------

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ;Relative postioning
G1 Z5 F600 ;Raise Hotend
G90 ;Absolute postioning
G28 X Y ;Home 
M104 S0 T0 ;Hotend 1 off 
M104 S0 T1 ;Hotend 2 off 
M140 S0 ;Bed off
M84 ;Motors off
